tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_interactions ( 
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP, 
    touchpoint VARCHAR(50), 
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50), 
    interaction_details TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
 interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
 interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_channel VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
  touchpoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  touchpoint_name VARCHAR(100),
  touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50),
  touchpoint_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    touchpoint VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
